title: Verify Project Setup
description: Complete the project setup and verify everything works.
instructions: Create the Prisma client helper and verify your server starts correctly. The lib/db.ts file should export a singleton Prisma client instance.

hints.text: Use globalThis to store the client instance, preventing multiple connections during hot reload
Check if prisma already exists on globalThis before creating a new instance

commonMistakes.mistake: Creating a new PrismaClient on every import
commonMistakes.consequence: Causes 'too many connections' errors during development with hot reload
commonMistakes.correction: Store the client in globalThis and reuse it

commonMistakes.mistake: Not configuring logging based on environment
commonMistakes.consequence: Either missing debug info in development or noisy logs in production
commonMistakes.correction: Use the log option with environment-based configuration
